Reviews.Title: Seems to be as good as the Panasonic battery
Reviews.Author: preferred user
Reviews.Content: I own several of the 'japanese horseradish' version of this charger/battery for other cameras and felt I might be taking a risk on this one.  As it turns out, it seems to be of similar, if not the same manufacture and suits my need perfectly.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 1 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1600 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BLC12 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Panasonic Lumix DMC-G5KK 16.1MP Mirrorless Camera and Panasonic DMW-BLC12
